thread.title: Macy Gray vibrator song ‘B.O.B.’ video released |
thread.title_full: Macy Gray vibrator song ‘B.O.B.’ video released | The Advertiser

author: STAFF WRITERS
title: Macy Gray vibrator song ‘B.O.B.’ video released |
text:
IT’S a love song with a twist ... or perhaps we should say with a buzz.
Macy Gray’s new track B.O.B . is an ode to her vibrator, or as she calls it, her battery operated boyfriend.
Released a couple of days ago, the song includes lyrics such as:
He fits like a glove, always up for love
He gets me so excited
I turn him on
We go baby go
Start the fire and lightning
Ooh aah ooh I, I love my baby BOB
Speaking to Elle , the 47-year-old said she hopes the song inspires women to open up and discuss what’s “really real for them”.
“I hope girls can start talking ... and just say the crudest stuff,” the I Try singer said.
And make no mistake, the song isn’t a joke. It’s real, and so is the love Gray has for her vibrator.
“You get bored and you stop having sex and that’s a tragedy really,” she said.
“You should have a Bob. You should have all kinds of sh*t.”
Originally published as Macy’s love song about vibrators
